mapper.select: select * from request_timeover order by date_timeover desc
select * from request_vacation order by num_vacation desc
select * from user_info where user_auth=2 or user_auth=3
select * from request_timeover where user_email_timeover =#{value} order by num_timeover desc
select * from request_vacation where user_email_vacation =#{value} order by num_vacation desc
mapper.insert: merge into request_timeover using dual on(user_email_timeover=#{user_email_timeover} and check_timeover='진행중') when not matched then insert values(request_timeover_seq.NEXTVAL,#{user_nick_timeover},#{user_email_timeover}, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'HH24:MI'),TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'HH24:MI'),TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD'),#{reason_timeover},'진행중')
mapper.update: merge into request_timeover using dual on(user_email_timeover =#{user_email_timeover}) when matched then update set check_timeover ='대기', end_timeover =to_char(sysdate,'hh24:mi') where user_email_timeover=#{user_email_timeover} and check_timeover='진행중'
update user_info set user_auth = #{user_auth} where user_email=#{user_email}
mapper.insert: merge into user_info using dual on(user_email =#{user_email}) when not matched then insert values(#{user_email},#{user_nick},#{user_pwd},#{user_auth})
